'''Unique Rocks''' are uniquely-shaped rocks found in [[The Chasm]]. They will break after receiving a certain number of resonances in a short period of time from [[Unique Rock Pillar]]s, revealing a [[chest]]. The number of {{Geo}} symbols on a Unique Rock determines the number of resonances required to break it. They need to be hit within a certain amount of time or they will reset.
